Article 2 col - image left text right.body:
article.article
  .container
    h1 $0
    .row.image-left-text-right
      .col-md-6
        = image_tag($1, alt: '$2', class: 'img-fluid')
      .col-md-6
        p $0
Article 2 col - image left text right.description: Article element with two columns and image to the left and text to the right

Article with slider.body:
article.article$1
  .container.text-center
    h1 $2
    .slicker-slider*{ data: { slick: '{}' } }
      div
        p $3
      div
        p $0
Article with slider.description: Article element with slider on the inside

Article 2 col - text left image right.body:
article.article
  .container
    h1 $1
    .row.text-left-image-right
      .col-md-6
        p $0
      .col-md-6
        = image_tag($2, alt: '$3', class: 'img-fluid')
Article 2 col - text left image right.description: Article element with two columns and image to the right and text to the left

Text short and wide image after.body:
article.article
  .container
    h1 $3
    p $0

    = image_tag('$1', alt: '$2', class: 'img-fluid')
Text short and wide image after.description: Article element with title and short text. Then a wide image at the bottom.

Article with markdown part.description: Article element with markdown interpreting section
